    • Method Detail

      • prepareReadRecordsCmd

        public ReadRecordsRespPars prepareReadRecordsCmd(byte sfi,
                                                 ReadDataStructure readDataStructureEnum,
                                                 byte firstRecordNumber,
                                                 int expectedLength,
                                                 java.lang.String extraInfo)
        Prepare one or more read record ApduRequest based on the target revision to be executed following the selection.

        The expected length is provided and its value is checked between 1 and 250.

        In the case of a mixed target (rev2 or rev3) two commands are prepared. The first one in rev3 format, the second one in rev2 format (mainly class byte)

        Parameters:
        sfi - the sfi top select
        readDataStructureEnum - read mode enum to indicate a SINGLE, MULTIPLE or COUNTER read
        firstRecordNumber - the record number to read (or first record to read in case of several records)
        expectedLength - the expected length of the record(s)
        extraInfo - extra information included in the logs (can be null or empty)

      • prepareReadRecordsCmd

        public ReadRecordsRespPars prepareReadRecordsCmd(byte sfi,
                                                 ReadDataStructure readDataStructureEnum,
                                                 byte firstRecordNumber,
                                                 java.lang.String extraInfo)
        Prepare one or more read record ApduRequest based on the target revision to be executed following the selection. No expected length is specified, the record output length is handled automatically.

        In the case of a mixed target (rev2 or rev3) two commands are prepared. The first one in rev3 format, the second one in rev2 format (mainly class byte)

        Parameters:
        sfi - the sfi top select
        readDataStructureEnum - read mode enum to indicate a SINGLE, MULTIPLE or COUNTER read
        firstRecordNumber - the record number to read (or first record to read in case of several records)
        extraInfo - extra information included in the logs (can be null or empty)

      • prepareSelectFileDfCmd

        public SelectFileRespPars prepareSelectFileDfCmd(byte[] path,
                                                 java.lang.String extraInfo)
        Prepare a select file ApduRequest to be executed following the selection.

        Parameters:
        path - path from the MF (MF identifier excluded)
        extraInfo - extra information included in the logs (can be null or empty)

      • preparePoCustomReadCmd

        public void preparePoCustomReadCmd(java.lang.String name,
                                   org.eclipse.keyple.seproxy.message.ApduRequest apduRequest)
        Prepare a custom read ApduRequest to be executed following the selection.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the command (will appear in the ApduRequest log)
        apduRequest - the ApduRequest (the correct instruction byte must be provided)

      • preparePoCustomModificationCmd

        public void preparePoCustomModificationCmd(java.lang.String name,
                                           org.eclipse.keyple.seproxy.message.ApduRequest apduRequest)
        Prepare a custom modification ApduRequest to be executed following the selection.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the command (will appear in the ApduRequest log)
        apduRequest - the ApduRequest (the correct instruction byte must be provided)

      • updateParsersWithResponses

        protected void updateParsersWithResponses(org.eclipse.keyple.seproxy.message.SeResponse seResponse)
        Loops on the SeResponse and updates the list of parsers previously memorized
        Parameters:
        seResponse - the seResponse from the PO
